review_body: The room was newly renovated and clean. We thought we would have a cook top but there was only a microwave and fridge. Only 2 blocks from beach and 1 block from ABC store. We liked that you could borrow a boogie board and chairs.

Great location, close to beach, restaurants, shopping and transport. Rooms clean and comfortable and the ability to self cater is a bonus. Staff very friendly and helpful. Value for money without all the extra costs of the big hotels.

The hotel helps an affordable stay for Waikiki, when you are willing to do some of your own meal service in the room. Fridge and Microwave help. There are food sources near by, Multiple ABCs ,Whalers Market , nearby buffet breakfast options. Once or twice Markets in the Ramada complex nearby for fruit and salad portions.  A great option - the telephone is a smartphone which includes up to 30 minutes a day free use, take it with you for the day to call a taxi. Just make sure it remains when you leave or pay $150. The smart phone also includes apps for web access. A neat feature. Located 2 blocks from the Duke statue at Waikiki beach with free loaner body boards and beach towels included. Try to connect directly with their website, Once we were confirmed, I did not get responses to further informational enquiries, but we got the nights we originally booked, and were secure all visit.
